mapper.select: SELECT verse_content, verse_book_id, verse_chapter_num, verse_num, verse_seq FROM bible_verse WHERE verse_seq >= (SELECT verse_seq FROM bible_verse WHERE verse_book_id=#{startIndex.bookId} AND verse_chapter_num=#{startIndex.chapter} AND verse_num=#{startIndex.verse}) AND verse_seq <= (SELECT verse_seq FROM bible_verse WHERE verse_book_id=#{endIndex.bookId} AND verse_chapter_num=#{endIndex.chapter} AND verse_num=#{endIndex.verse}) ORDER BY verse_seq
